section.title: Users
section.p: If you use Solr, please subscribe to the Solr user mailing list.
The Solr user mailing list is : solr-user@lucene.apache.org.
section.note: In order to post to the list, it is necessary to first subscribe to it.

section.title: Developers
section.p: If you'd like to contribute to Solr, please subscribe to the Solr developer mailing list.
The Solr developer mailing list is : solr-dev@lucene.apache.org.
section.note: In order to post to the list, it is necessary to first subscribe to it.

section.title: Commits
section.p: If you'd like to see changes made in Solr's version control system then subscribe to the Solr commit mailing list.
